column5: Hey everyone, heading down to Niagara to do some hiking and fishing with a buddy this weekend. I have been down there fishing a few years ago and know that it is a different ball game than what we are used to. Anyone heard anything about the fishing down there recentely? Specifically whirlpool and down. Just curious as to what we could expect.  thanks
You can expect clear water conditions, 45-50f water temps, and a very treacherous trail on the way down, due to all the washouts from the constant rains of the last three weeks.
Might still be Steelhead in there...
